item.title: China ramps up threats over Panama Canal ruling that handed Trump a major victory
item.description: The Panama Canal has been thrust into the middle of a power struggle between the U.S. and China, the world's two largest economies.

item.title: Trump says India won't buy Russian oil anymore. Moscow insists India hasn't said that
item.description: Analysts are skeptical that India will stop buying Russian oil completely.

item.title: Venezuela tells China oil prices won't be set by the U.S., seeks to reassure investment after Maduro capture
item.description: Venezuela assured Beijing that its oil pricing will not be dictated by the U.S. and that Chinese investment in the South American country will remain ...

item.title: Senate Banking Democrats demand delay on Warsh nomination until Powell and Cook investigations end
item.description: Sen. Thom Tillis, R-N.C., has separately vowed to hold up the nomination until the DOJ resolves its criminal investigation of Fed Chair Jerome Powell.

item.title: Trump: If states can't run elections 'honestly,' then 'somebody else should take over'
item.description: Trump had been asked what he meant when he called on members of the Republican Party to "take over the voting" in a recent interview with Dan Bongino.
